alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. John The Baptist, central Ascension, central St. James and southeastern Livingston Parishes through 530 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitehall, or 10 miles north of Reserve, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Reserve, Gramercy, Lutcher, Sorrento, Wallace, Convent, North Vacherie, Garyville, Whitehall, South Vacherie and Killian. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 180 and 201. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension
